readable.title: 2393298349_e659308218
readable.content: A dog and a goat chase two kids playing soccer . There are two kids , a soccer ball , a dog and a goat outside in a field . Two boys play soccer while a dog and a goat run after them . Two children are playing soccer near to a black dog and a white goat . Two children are playing with a soccer ball in a grassy field also containing a white goat and a small black dog .
